description.value: Your suppressing attacks can pin down foes in place, preventing them from moving at more than a crawling pace. When you suppress a target with one of your attacks, increase the speed penalty to a â€“20-foot status penalty for the duration of the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} condition. If the effect that imparted the suppressed condition was a critical hit, or the target critically failed the effect and becomes suppressed, then the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.
